targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  test_info.date, test_info.test_result, test_info.client_result, test_info.server_result
FROM
prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY test_info.date DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  test_info.date, test_info.test_id
FROM
prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY test_info.date DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT frame_number, test_id, global_frame_time, draw_frame_time, game_frame_time, rhit_frame_time, gpu_frame_time
FROM prjperformancetool.client_metrics

SELECT date, test_id
FROM prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT frame_number, test_id, global_frame_time, game_thread_idle_time, networking_time
FROM prjperformancetool.server_metrics
ORDER BY test_id DESC

SELECT date, test_id
FROM prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY date
LIMIT 100
SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.client_pass_fail

SELECT
  test_info.date, client_pass_fail.*
FROM
prjperformancetool.test_info
INNER JOIN prjperformancetool.client_pass_fail ON test_info.test_id=client_pass_fail.test_id
ORDER BY test_info.date DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  test_info.date, client_pass_fail.*
FROM
prjperformancetool.test_info
INNER JOIN prjperformancetool.client_pass_fail ON test_info.test_id=client_pass_fail.test_id
ORDER BY test_info.date DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY date
LIMIT 100
SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.client_pass_fail

SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.client_pass_fail

SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.server_pass_fail

SELECT
  test_info.date, server_pass_fail.*
FROM
prjperformancetool.test_info
INNER JOIN prjperformancetool.server_pass_fail ON test_info.test_id=server_pass_fail.test_id
ORDER BY test_info.date DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  test_info.date, server_pass_fail.*
FROM
prjperformancetool.test_info
INNER JOIN prjperformancetool.server_pass_fail ON test_info.test_id=server_pass_fail.test_id
ORDER BY test_info.date DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY date
LIMIT 100
SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.server_pass_fail

SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.test_info
ORDER BY date
LIMIT 100
SELECT * FROM prjperformancetool.server_pass_fail
